validation.validation: This document must have a status of In Progress, Incomplete, or Draft for Workday to process the Import Taxable Document Tax Details web service.
The document isn't enabled for third-party tax service.
You can't use this web service when tax option is blank or is Enter Tax Due to Supplier on a supplier invoice.
You must have access to the domain 'Process: Customer invoice Core' to import tax details into a customer invoice.
You must have access to the domain 'Process: Supplier invoice Core' to import tax details into a supplier invoice.

Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Free form comment regarding the business process.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.

Taxable_Document_Line_Tax_Rate_Data.description: Reference to Tax Rate Tax Type

validation.validation: [[[TDL]][[[TaxRate]] - When recoverability is non-recoverable, the recoverable amount must be zero.
[[[TDL]][[[TaxRate]] - Tax rate recoverability is required for supplier invoice and invoice adjustment.
[[[TDL]][[[TaxRate]] - When recoverability is fully recoverable, non-recoverable amount must be zero.
[[[TDL]][[[TaxRate]] - Tax type is required for supplier invoice and invoice adjustment.
[[[TDL]][[[TaxRate]] - The tax amount of the line tax rate must be equal to the sum of the recoverable and non-recoverable amounts.
[[[TDL]][[[TaxRate]] - Tax recoverable percentage 100 requires tax recoverability of fully recoverable.
[[[TDL]][[[TaxRate]] - Tax recoverable percentage between 0 and 100 requires recoverability of partially recoverable.
[[[TDL]][[[TaxRate]] - Tax type must be tax paid or tax self-assessed for supplier invoice and invoice adjustment.
[[[TDL]][[[TaxRate]] - When lease accounting is used, tax recoverability must be fully recoverable.
[[[TDL]][[[TaxRate]] - Specify a valid tax rate for the tax code.
[[[TDL]][[[TaxRate]] - Tax type must be blank or tax collected for customer invoice and invoice adjustment.
[[[TDL]][[[TaxRate]] - Tax recoverable percentage of 0 requires tax recoverability of non-recoverable.

Taxable_Document_Tax_Data.description: Taxable Document Line for Tax Calculation Data

validation.validation: [[[TDL]] - Specify a valid line reference ID for this invoice.
[[[TDL]] - Provide a unique tax rate for the tax document line.

description: Taxable Document for Tax Calculation Header Data

validation.validation: When the invoice is in In-Progress status, you can run the Import Taxable Document Tax Details web service only in Submit mode, but not in Auto Complete mode.
You must put the invoice in Draft or In-Progress status before you submit it.
